channel.title: readthedocs.io on Learning for fun and profits
channel.description: Recent content in readthedocs.io on Learning for fun and profits

item.title: Reddit bot to make a wordcloud
item.description: A Reddit bot that read posts and comments from a subreddit, tokenize them and output a wordcloud. The shape of the wordcloud can be configured. It is a very small project, was one of my first “real-world” project using a third-party API.
